keyMoments.title: CP9 Threatens Buster Call
keyMoments.description: CP9 reveals they have the authority from Admiral Aokiji to initiate a Buster Call, forcing Robin to surrender.
keyMoments.significance: This demonstrates CP9's immense power and authority within the World Government, capable of calling the most devastating military attack.

keyMoments.title: CP9 Captures Franky
keyMoments.description: Led by Rob Lucci, CP9 successfully captures Franky at his hideout, with Blueno using his Devil Fruit powers to restrain opponents.
keyMoments.significance: This shows CP9's efficiency in completing their mission to capture both Robin and Franky for transport to Enies Lobby.

jollyRoger.description: CP9 does not have a Jolly Roger as they are a World Government organization

keyMoments.title: Robin's Sacrifice for the Crew Revealed
keyMoments.description: It's revealed that Robin surrendered herself to CP9 to protect the Straw Hats from a Buster Call, showing the depth of her loyalty to her nakama.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation transforms the crew's mission from confusion to a unified determination to rescue Robin, demonstrating the bonds of the Straw Hat crew.

keyMoments.title: Crew Decides to Rescue Robin
keyMoments.description: After learning the truth, Nami immediately moves to gather the crew to save Robin, beginning the rescue mission.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the beginning of what will become the Enies Lobby assault, one of the crew's most daring missions.

keyMoments.title: Going Merry Set Adrift
keyMoments.description: The crew's beloved first ship, the Going Merry, is released by the Galley-La foremen to drift out to sea.
keyMoments.significance: This foreshadows the eventual farewell to the Going Merry and represents a transition point for the crew.

ships.description: In this episode, the Going Merry is set adrift by the Galley-La foremen, beginning its journey toward eventual destruction.

jollyRoger.description: A skull wearing a straw hat with crossed bones behind it

keyMoments.title: Iceburg and Paulie Rescued
keyMoments.description: Chopper saves Iceburg and Paulie from the burning Galley-La headquarters, earning the gratitude of Water 7 citizens.
keyMoments.significance: This heroic act begins to restore the Straw Hats' reputation in Water 7 after being falsely accused.

keyMoments.title: Galley-La Releases Going Merry
keyMoments.description: The Galley-La foremen release the Going Merry, allowing it to drift to sea as an act of mercy for the unrepairable ship.
keyMoments.significance: This decision by Galley-La marks the beginning of the end for the Going Merry.

jollyRoger.description: Galley-La Company does not have a Jolly Roger as they are a legitimate business
